using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace divide
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int ans = 0;
            long input = Convert.ToInt64(Console.ReadLine());
            for (int i = 1; i <input; i++)
            {
                if (input % i == 0)
                {
                    ans = ans + i;
                }
            }
            Console.WriteLine(ans);
        }
    }
}
